verses.verse: וְעַתָּ֤ה ׀ <S%H6258><s%> now שָֽׂחֲק֣וּ <S%H7832><s%> than I have me in derision עָלַי֮ <S%H5921><s%> and צְעִירִ֥ים <S%H6810><s%> those מִמֶּ֗נִּי <S%H4480><s%> than לְיָ֫מִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> age אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Whose מָאַ֥סְתִּי <S%H3988><s%> I would have disdained אֲבוֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> whose fathers לָ֝שִׁ֗ית <S%H7896><s%> to have set עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with כַּלְבֵ֥י <S%H3611><s%> with the dogs צֹאנִֽי׃ <S%H6629><s%> of my flock

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Indeed כֹּ֣חַ <S%H3581><s%> [might] the strength יְ֭דֵיהֶם <S%H3027><s%> of their hands לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Yea whereto לִּ֑י עָ֝לֵ֗ימוֹ <S%H5921><s%> and אָ֣בַד <S%H6><s%> was perished כָּֽלַח׃ <S%H3624><s%> [profit] me in whom old age

בְּחֶ֥סֶר <S%H2639><s%> For want וּבְכָפָ֗ן <S%H3720><s%> and famine גַּ֫לְמ֥וּד <S%H1565><s%> [they were] solitary הַֽעֹרְקִ֥ים <S%H6207><s%> fleeing צִיָּ֑ה <S%H6723><s%> into the wilderness אֶ֝֗מֶשׁ <S%H570><s%> in former time שׁוֹאָ֥ה <S%H7722><s%> desolate וּמְשֹׁאָֽה׃ <S%H4875><s%> and waste

הַקֹּטְפִ֣ים <S%H6998><s%> Who cut up מַלּ֣וּחַ <S%H4408><s%> mallows עֲלֵי־ <S%H5921><s%> by שִׂ֑יחַ <S%H7880><s%> by the bushes וְשֹׁ֖רֶשׁ <S%H8328><s%> roots רְתָמִ֣ים <S%H7574><s%> and juniper לַחְמָֽם׃ <S%H3899><s%> [for] their meat

מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from גֵּ֥ו <S%H1460><s%> from among יְגֹרָ֑שׁוּ <S%H1644><s%> They were driven forth יָרִ֥יעוּ <S%H7321><s%> [men] (they cried עָ֝לֵ֗ימוֹ <S%H5921><s%> against כַּגַּנָּֽב׃ <S%H1590><s%> as a thief

בַּעֲר֣וּץ <S%H6178><s%> in the clifts נְחָלִ֣ים <S%H5158><s%> of the valleys לִשְׁכֹּ֑ן <S%H7931><s%> To dwell חֹרֵ֖י <S%H2356><s%> [in] caves עָפָ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> of the earth וְכֵפִֽים׃ <S%H3710><s%> and [in] the rocks

בֵּין־ <S%H996><s%> Among שִׂיחִ֥ים <S%H7880><s%> Among the bushes יִנְהָ֑קוּ <S%H5101><s%> they brayed תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> Under חָר֣וּל <S%H2738><s%> under the nettles יְסֻפָּֽחוּ׃ <S%H5596><s%> they were gathered together

בְּֽנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> [They were] children נָ֭בָל <S%H5036><s%> of fools גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> even בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> yea children בְלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> without שֵׁ֑ם <S%H8034><s%> of base men נִ֝כְּא֗וּ <S%H5217><s%> they were viler מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> than the earth

וְ֭עַתָּה <S%H6258><s%> and now נְגִינָתָ֣ם <S%H5058><s%> And now am I their song הָיִ֑יתִי <S%H1961><s%> have become וָאֱהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> like לְמִלָּֽה׃ <S%H4405><s%> yea I am their byword

תִּֽ֭עֲבוּנִי <S%H8581><s%> They abhor רָ֣חֲקוּ <S%H7368><s%> me they flee far מֶ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at וּ֝מִפָּנַ֗י <S%H6440><s%> in my face לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not חָ֥שְׂכוּ <S%H2820><s%> from me and spare רֹֽק׃ <S%H7536><s%> not to spit

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because [יִתְרֹו כ] (יִתְרִ֣י <S%H3499><s%> abundant ק) פִ֭תַּח <S%H6605><s%> Because he hath loosed וַיְעַנֵּ֑נִי <S%H6031><s%> and afflicted וְ֝רֶ֗סֶן <S%H7448><s%> the bridle מִפָּנַ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before שִׁלֵּֽחוּ׃ <S%H7971><s%> me they have also let loose

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יָמִין֮ <S%H3225><s%> Upon [my] right פִּרְחַ֪ח <S%H6526><s%> the youth יָ֫ק֥וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> [hand] rise רַגְלַ֥י <S%H7272><s%> my feet שִׁלֵּ֑חוּ <S%H7971><s%> they push away וַיָּסֹ֥לּוּ <S%H5549><s%> and they raise up עָ֝לַ֗י <S%H5921><s%> against אָרְח֥וֹת <S%H734><s%> against me the ways אֵידָֽם׃ <S%H343><s%> of their destruction

נָתְס֗וּ <S%H5420><s%> They mar נְֽתִיבָ֫תִ֥י <S%H5410><s%> my path לְהַוָּתִֽי <S%H1942><s%> my destruction יֹעִ֑ילוּ <S%H3276><s%> they set forward לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> No עֹזֵ֣ר <S%H5826><s%> they have no helper לָֽמוֹ׃

כְּפֶ֣רֶץ <S%H6556><s%> breaking רָחָ֣ב <S%H7342><s%> [upon me] as a wide יֶאֱתָ֑יוּ <S%H857><s%> They came תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> in [of waters] in שֹׁ֝אָ֗ה <S%H7722><s%> the desolation הִתְגַּלְגָּֽלוּ׃ <S%H1556><s%> they rolled

הָהְפַּ֥ךְ <S%H2015><s%> are turned עָלַ֗י <S%H5921><s%> against בַּלָּ֫ה֥וֹת <S%H1091><s%> Terrors תִּרְדֹּ֣ף <S%H7291><s%> upon me they pursue כָּ֭רוּחַ <S%H7307><s%> as the wind נְדִבָתִ֑י <S%H5082><s%> my soul וּ֝כְעָ֗ב <S%H5645><s%> as a cloud עָבְרָ֥ה <S%H5674><s%> passeth away יְשֻׁעָתִֽי׃ <S%H3444><s%> and my welfare

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> and now עָ֭לַי <S%H5921><s%> within תִּשְׁתַּפֵּ֣ךְ <S%H8210><s%> is poured out נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> And now my soul יֹ֖אחֲז֣וּנִי <S%H270><s%> have taken hold יְמֵי־ <S%H3117><s%> upon me the days עֹֽנִי׃ <S%H6040><s%> of affliction

לַ֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> in me in the night season עֲ֭צָמַי <S%H6106><s%> My bones נִקַּ֣ר <S%H5365><s%> are pierced מֵעָלָ֑י <S%H5921><s%> and וְ֝עֹרְקַ֗י <S%H6207><s%> and my sinews לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יִשְׁכָּבֽוּן׃ <S%H7901><s%> take no rest

בְּרָב־ <S%H7227><s%> in abundance כֹּ֭חַ <S%H3581><s%> force יִתְחַפֵּ֣שׂ <S%H2664><s%> changed לְבוּשִׁ֑י <S%H3830><s%> [of my disease] is my garment כְּפִ֖י <S%H6310><s%> as the collar כֻתָּנְתִּ֣י <S%H3801><s%> of my coat יַֽאַזְרֵֽנִי׃ <S%H247><s%> it bindeth me about
הֹרָ֥נִי <S%H3384><s%> He hath cast לַחֹ֑מֶר <S%H2563><s%> me into the mire וָ֝אֶתְמַשֵּׁ֗ל <S%H4911><s%> and I am become like כֶּעָפָ֥ר <S%H6083><s%> dust וָאֵֽפֶר׃ <S%H665><s%> and ashes

אֲשַׁוַּ֣ע <S%H7768><s%> I cry אֵ֭לֶיךָ <S%H413><s%> about וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תַעֲנֵ֑נִי <S%H6030><s%> unto thee and thou dost not hear עָ֝מַ֗דְתִּי <S%H5975><s%> me I stand up וַתִּתְבֹּ֥נֶן <S%H995><s%> and thou regardest בִּֽי׃
תֵּהָפֵ֣ךְ <S%H2015><s%> Thou art become לְאַכְזָ֣ר <S%H393><s%> cruel לִ֑י בְּעֹ֖צֶם <S%H6108><s%> to me with thy strong יָדְךָ֣ <S%H3027><s%> hand תִשְׂטְמֵֽנִי׃ <S%H7852><s%> thou opposest

תִּשָּׂאֵ֣נִי <S%H5375><s%> Thou liftest me up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to ר֭וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> to the wind תַּרְכִּיבֵ֑נִי <S%H7392><s%> thou causest me to ride וּ֝תְמֹגְגֵ֗נִי <S%H4127><s%> [upon it] and dissolvest [תְּשֻׁוֶּה כ] (תּוּשִׁיָּֽה׃ <S%H7738><s%> substance ק)

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָ֭דַעְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> For I know מָ֣וֶת <S%H4194><s%> me [to] death תְּשִׁיבֵ֑נִי <S%H7725><s%> [that] thou wilt bring וּבֵ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> and [to] the house מוֹעֵ֣ד <S%H4150><s%> appointed לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all חָֽי׃ <S%H2416><s%> for all living

אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> Yet לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not בְ֭עִי <S%H1164><s%> to the grave יִשְׁלַח־ <S%H7971><s%> Howbeit he will not stretch out יָ֑ד <S%H3027><s%> [his] hand אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Or בְּ֝פִיד֗וֹ <S%H6365><s%> in his destruction לָהֶ֥ן <S%H3861><s%> but שֽׁוּעַ׃ <S%H7769><s%> though they cry

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not בָ֭כִיתִי <S%H1058><s%> Did not I weep לִקְשֵׁה־ <S%H7186><s%> churlish י֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> life עָֽגְמָ֥ה <S%H5701><s%> grieved נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> any לָאֶבְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H34><s%> to the poor

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> When ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> for good קִ֭וִּיתִי <S%H6960><s%> When I looked וַיָּ֣בֹא <S%H935><s%> came רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> then evil וַֽאֲיַחֲלָ֥ה <S%H3176><s%> [unto me] and when I waited לְ֝א֗וֹר <S%H216><s%> for light וַיָּ֥בֹא <S%H935><s%> there came אֹֽפֶל׃ <S%H652><s%> darkness

מֵעַ֖י <S%H4578><s%> My bowels רֻתְּח֥וּ <S%H7570><s%> boiled וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and cannot דָ֗מּוּ <S%H1826><s%> and rested קִדְּמֻ֥נִי <S%H6923><s%> prevented יְמֵי־ <S%H3117><s%> not the days עֹֽנִי׃ <S%H6040><s%> of affliction

קֹדֵ֣ר <S%H6937><s%> mourning הִ֭לַּכְתִּי <S%H1980><s%> I went בְּלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> without חַמָּ֑ה <S%H2535><s%> without the sun קַ֖מְתִּי <S%H6965><s%> I stood up בַקָּהָ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> in the congregation אֲשַׁוֵּֽעַ׃ <S%H7768><s%> [and] I cried

אָ֭ח <S%H251><s%> I am a brother הָיִ֣יתִי <S%H1961><s%> have become לְתַנִּ֑ים <S%H8577><s%> to dragons וְ֝רֵ֗עַ <S%H7453><s%> and a companion לִבְנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> first יַעֲנָֽה׃ <S%H3284><s%> owl

ע֭וֹרִי <S%H5785><s%> My skin שָׁחַ֣ר <S%H7835><s%> is black מֵעָלָ֑י <S%H5921><s%> on וְעַצְמִי־ <S%H6106><s%> upon me and my bones חָ֝֗רָה <S%H2787><s%> are burned מִנִּי־ <S%H4480><s%> with חֹֽרֶב׃ <S%H2721><s%> with heat

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> is turned לְ֭אֵבֶל <S%H60><s%> also is [turned] to mourning כִּנֹּרִ֑י <S%H3658><s%> My harp וְ֝עֻגָבִ֗י <S%H5748><s%> and my organ לְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> into the voice בֹּכִֽים׃ <S%H1058><s%> of them that weep
